title: Solo Ranked is still Broken
body:
You cannot reward individual gameplay by group objectives. It's the reason solo match-made doesn't go up vs premade 5 man teams. 

It's been said before by a RIOT employee that 'Enemy Nexus destruction is the goal, and that is the only way you gain LP.'

This is bullshit for solo players since no matter HOW well I play there's no way I can a) control the level of skill or motivations of my team. b) Kill the nexus alone without losing my own Nexus before I can achieve it.

The way solo ranked is now I see alot of 'got carried' shit in chat all the time. **THIS should never be the case.** If you get LP it should be based on how well you played your role in the team otherwise why else would there even be fuckign role and positions? wtf would be the point of jungle, mid or any of the other three??

replies.body:
it will never be individually ranked, the current system is luck based imo and has very little to do with skill.

_Solo queue_ really means your losing lp because of 1,2,3,4 people dragging you down.

Objective number one should be DO YOUR JOB IN THE POSITION YOU'RE IN. 

THEN the Nexus.

So 50% your LP should be from your skill (Much like scoring S S- or S+ on a champ) and then another 50>% LP from winning. 

Losing LP should only happen when you failed to hit your personal objectives AND lose the game. 

If your team wins BUT you don't get an S by completing your personal objectives in your role, then you break even. And vise versa.
